env DELTAT_DB=$PWD/foo.sqlite

deltat entry new --description 'First' 8:00a 8:30a
deltat entry new --description 'Second' 8:45a 8:55a

# Isolate second task.
deltat timesheet --all --format=csv
tail -n-1
stdout Second
cut -d , -f 1
read ENTRY_ID

# Delete the second task.
deltat entry delete $ENTRY_ID

# Verify the first task is present and the second task is no longer present.
deltat timesheet --all --format=plain
stdout First
! stdout Second
